last_episode_to_air.name: Zack Braff Masters a Custom Remodel
last_episode_to_air.overview: Zach Braff scrubs in for a special operation: a renovation for his best friend and new homeowner drowning in to-dos. With the help of Jonathan and Drew, they work out the kinks to craft a forever dream home for this family of four.

name: Celebrity IOU
overview: Twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott help Hollywood A-listers express their deep gratitude to the individuals who have had a major impact on their lives by surprising them with big, heartwarming home renovations that bring everyone to tears.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: This season may be the best one yet, as redesigns get more detailed and timelines are even tighter than usual. But each remodel gets every ounce of hard work and creativity necessary to make the space magical. Every reveal is an emotional roller coaster as the celebrities jump right in because of their gratitude for amazing people.

episodes.name: Brad Pitt's Gifting a Backyard Pad
episodes.overview: Brad Pitt recruits Drew and Jonathan Scott to help him surprise his friend and makeup artist of 30 years by renovating her detached garage. They turn her 400-square-foot unit into a showstopping guest suite, makeup station and storage area.

episodes.name: Melissa McCarthy's Hero Home Makeover
episodes.overview: Melissa McCarthy heads to Chicago to give back to her aunt and uncle, both retired cops. Melissa creates an upstairs retreat where her aunt can cook and entertain, and a downstairs man cave equipped with all the comforts her uncle deserves.

episodes.name: Viola Davis Delivers a Dream Home
episodes.overview: Viola Davis heads to Minneapolis to surprise her best friend of 30 years with a home renovation where Jonathan and Drew create a peaceful sanctuary.

episodes.name: Michael Buble's Shocking Surprise!
episodes.overview: Singer Michael Bublé pays tribute to his grandfather by fulfilling his final wish, to provide his caretaker with a place to live. Michael calls on Drew and Jonathan Scott to help him renovate his grandfather's house before surprising her with it.

episodes.name: Rebel Wilson's Surprise Outdoor Oasis
episodes.overview: Rebel Wilson's newly married hairstylist and best friend spent her savings to buy a home, leaving the couple with barely any money to renovate the backyard. Rebel works with Drew and Jonathan to turn the arid space into an oasis.

episodes.name: A Mom Renner-vation!
episodes.overview: Actor Jeremy Renner is moving his mother to Los Angeles to be closer to her family so he calls on Drew and Jonathan Scott to transform her dated condo into a modern-meets-cozy oasis.

episodes.name: Zooey Deschanel's Stunner
episodes.overview: Actress Zooey Deschanel surprises her best friend, Sarah, with a life-changing renovation.

episodes.name: Allison Janney's Showstopper
episodes.overview: Actress Allison Janney teams up with Jonathan and Drew Scott to give back to her assistant, Ilana.

episodes.name: Justin Hartley's Bombshell
episodes.overview: Justin Hartley gives back to his friend Mat for being the rock that saved him in rough times.

episodes.name: Rainn Wilson's Surprise
episodes.overview: Actor Rainn Wilson surprises his son's nanny, Leslie, with a home makeover.

episodes.name: Kris Jenner's Backyard Retreat
episodes.overview: Kris Jenner and daughters Kim Kardashian and Kendall are teaming up with Jonathan and Drew to surprise long-time family friend, Lisa with a show-stopping renovation. Kris and Lisa have seen each other through everything over the past 40 years.

episodes.name: Leann Rimes' Lifesaving Thank You
episodes.overview: LeAnn Rimes is calling on Jonathan and Drew to help her renovate her dear friend Roger's home.

episodes.name: Kevin Hart's Heartfelt Thanks
episodes.overview: After helping him through a critical injury, Kevin Hart wants to thank his trainer and friend, Boss, by transforming his backhouse into a sleek man cave. He teams up with Jonathan and Drew to give Boss a stylish space where he can relax with friends.

episodes.name: Gwyneth Paltrow's Forever Home Update
episodes.overview: Gwyneth Paltrow says her assistant, Kevin, is more like a brother than a colleague, and she wants Jonathan and Drew's help to transform his dated condo into a stylish forever home. Together they turn its impractical layout into an entertainer's dream.

episodes.name: Darren Criss Makes Over His Manager's Garage
episodes.overview: Darren Criss credits his manager and friend, Ricky, for helping him get to where he is today. With Jonathan and Drew's help, they turn his detached garage into a five-star flex space, complete with a spa-like bathroom and outdoor kitchen.

episodes.name: Josh Groban's Life-Changing Gift To His Bandmate
episodes.overview: Josh Groban is calling on Jonathan and Drew to help him give his bandmate and friend, Mark a well deserved renovation. Mark's cramped garage studio isn't adequate for a musician of his talent, so Josh is surprising him with a high-tech recording setup.

episodes.name: Tiffany Haddish Returns the Love
episodes.overview: Tiffany Haddish wants to return her best friend's unconditional love and support with the stylish home makeover she deserves. With Jonathan and Drew's help, Tiffany gets down with the demo to make sure her friend's new five-star pad is on point!

episodes.name: Howie Mandel's Sensational Surprise
episodes.overview: Jonathan and Drew help Howie Mandel pull off the ultimate prank with a surprise home makeover for his best friend and road manager of 30 years. Together, they'll turn this bachelor pad into a hip home where his friend can entertain and unwind in style.

episodes.name: Snoop Dogg's Winning Gift
episodes.overview: Snoop Dogg wants to recognize the impact the commissioner of his football league has had on the community's kids. To help Snoop give a gift like no other, Jonathan and Drew assist in turning a garage into a personalized luxury retreat meets home office.

episodes.name: Ali Wong's Renovation Surprise for a Dear Friend
episodes.overview: Comedian Ali Wong's college friend, Citadelle, is a working mother who opens her home and her heart to everyone. With Jonathan and Drew's help, Ali is returning the love by transforming Citadelle's barren basement into the entertaining heart of her home.

episodes.name: Lisa Kudrow's Stunning Condo Surprise
episodes.overview: Lisa Kudrow's cousin and best friend has been through a rough few years, but she's continued to open her heart and home to rescued pets. Lisa brings in Jonathan and Drew to update her cousin's condo into a stylish, functional and animal-friendly home.

episodes.name: John C. Reilly's Funky Cabin Makeover
episodes.overview: John C. Reilly's longtime friend owns an eclectic junkyard that's a neighborhood hangout, but the property's century-old cabin is in need of help. Jonathan and Drew join in to give the house the modern upgrade it deserves without losing its funky flair!

episodes.name: Anthony Anderson's Ultimate Thank You
episodes.overview: Anthony Anderson wants to give back to his selfless brother, Derrick, who has been busy working the front lines in the ER during the pandemic. Jonathan and Drew join Anthony in turning his brother's dated house into the modern space his family deserves.

episodes.name: Halle Berry's Beautiful Gift for Cherished Teacher
episodes.overview: Mega superstar Halle Berry is eager to thank her fifth-grade teacher for having a profoundly positive impact on her youth and identity. She brings in Jonathan and Drew to return the love and surprise her lifelong mentor with a luxurious home makeover.

episodes.name: Leslie Jordan's Life-Changing Renovation
episodes.overview: Emmy winner and funny man Leslie Jordan calls on Jonathan and Drew to gift his long-time friends of 40 years with a life-changing renovation. Remaining true to their Southwestern style, Leslie delivers a modern refresh to their beloved and cherished home.

episodes.name: Idina Menzel's Slam Dunk Reno
episodes.overview: Queen of Broadway Idina Menzel gifts a life-changing surprise to her good friend and son's basketball coach. It's a race against the clock as she calls on Jonathan and Drew to turn his unused garage into a showstopping retreat and training facility.

episodes.name: Terry Crews' Outdoor Upgrade
episodes.overview: Actor and superstar Terry Crews teams up with Jonathan and Drew to deliver his close friend and driver a stunning upgrade to his home's backyard. Terry pulls out all the stops with a stylish outdoor kitchen, dining space and top-of-the-line outdoor gym.

episodes.name: Kate Hudson's Extravagant Backyard Build
episodes.overview: International movie star Kate Hudson joins forces with Jonathan and Drew to give her future mother-in-law an unbelievable, surprise backyard makeover. Kate gets down to work to turn her tired outdoor space into a luxurious oasis to relax and entertain.

episodes.name: Cindy Crawford's Super Remodel
episodes.overview: Supermodel icon Cindy Crawford calls on Jonathan and Drew to pull off a surprise renovation for her best friend and personal trainer of 17 years. After years of adversity, Cindy is pulling out all the stops for her friend with a glamorous home makeover.

episodes.name: Cheryl Hines Gifts a Garage Makeover
episodes.overview: Emmy nominated actress Cheryl Hines is showing her gratitude to her close friend of nearly 20 years with a surprise renovation. She teams up with Jonathan and Drew to transform an underused garage into a gorgeous multi-function guest suite.

episodes.name: Wilmer Valderrama's Surprise Garage Reno
episodes.overview: Wilmer Valderrama is giving back to his former security guard and best friend of more than 20 years. Wilmer joins Drew and Jonathan Scott to help turn his friend’s unfinished garage into a fabulous flex space and guest suite.

episodes.name: Drew Barrymore's Spectacular Reno Surprise
episodes.overview: Superstar Drew Barrymore calls on Jonathan and Drew to gift her best friend and makeup artist of 20 years with a life-changing renovation. After several tough years, Drew delivers a spectacular home makeover fit for the next chapter of her friend's life.

episodes.name: Heidi Klum's Legacy Remodel
episodes.overview: Supermodel sensation Heidi Klum teams up with Jonathan and Drew to surprise her housekeeper of 17 years with a complete house transformation. Heidi pulls out all the stops to deliver a luxurious home where the family can build a lifetime of memories.

episodes.name: Kristin Chenoweth's Multi-Generational Gift
episodes.overview: Screen and stage superstar Kristin Chenoweth enlists Jonathan and Drew to gift her cherished property managers with a five-star home makeover. Kristen considers them part of her family, and will do whatever it takes to deliver an unforgettable surprise!

episodes.name: Glenn Close Gifts a One of a Kind Home
episodes.overview: Award-winning movie star Glenn Close joins Jonathan and Drew to surprise her longtime friend with a backyard retreat. Glenn and the brothers go to new heights to deliver a one-of-a-kind gift by creating a place of outdoor solace for the family.

episodes.name: Kristin Davis's Dream Home Surprise
episodes.overview: Iconic actress Kristin Davis jumps into the world of demo and design to surprise her close friend and fellow single mom with a dream home renovation. She brings in Jonathan and Drew to give the ultimate thank-you by transforming the home inside and out!

episodes.name: Jay Leno's Multi-Generation Renovation
episodes.overview: Jay Leno calls on Jonathan and Drew to help with a special gift for his dear friend, someone he considers like a son. With a newborn on the way, Jay wants to surprise the growing family with a bathroom makeover and a nursery in their century-old home.

episodes.name: Derek and Julianne Hough's Fresh Flip
episodes.overview: Derek and Julianne Hough jump in with Jonathan and Drew to gift their close friend and trainer. After being forced to close his gym, the Hough siblings want to kickstart his next chapter by spinning his outdated condo into a sleek and personalized space.

episodes.name: Tariji P. Henson's Garden Surprise
episodes.overview: Taraji P. Henson recruits Jonathan and Drew to give back to the woman she considers like a second mother. Taraji upgrades her beloved backyard into a five-star garden oasis fit for entertaining, her love of potting plants, and relaxation.

episodes.name: Emma Roberts' Makeover for Aunt Moo
episodes.overview: Emma Roberts teams up with Jonathan and Drew to surprise her honorary Aunt Mela with a custom kitchen transformation. Aunt "Moo" has spent her life helping others and rescuing animals, so now Emma wants to create an eclectic space for her to enjoy.

episodes.name: Everyone Loves a Ray Romano Renovation
episodes.overview: Ray Romano gifts his friend and assistant of 23 years with a spa-like upgrade to her main suite. With Jonathan and Drew's help, Ray is not just repairing Christy's outdated digs, but upgrading the space with all the trimmings of a chic boutique hotel.

episodes.name: Anna Faris's Swanky Surprise
episodes.overview: Anna Faris teams up with Jonathan and Drew to surprise Amanda, her BFF for the past 24 years. Anna wants to show her immense gratitude with a swanky kitchen and dining room transformation that boasts a hidden speakeasy bar.

episodes.name: Regina Hall's Monumental Thank You
episodes.overview: Regina Hall is giving back to one of the closest people in her life, who has also been a pillar of support to her for the past 15 years. With Jonathan and Drew's help, Regina surprises her friend and family with a home renovation and so much more.

episodes.name: Fran Drescher's Fabulous Thank You
episodes.overview: Fran Drescher teams up with Jonathan and Drew to thank her housekeepers of 30 years, whom she considers family. The former Nanny plans to surprise them with a fabulous upgrade to their beloved home and repair structural issues to ensure the home's safety.

episodes.name: Mayim Bialik Gifts Backyard Zen
episodes.overview: Mayim Bialik calls on Jonathan and Drew to transform her longtime bestie's overgrown backyard into a five-star oasis. With an outdoor kitchen and studio for writing and yoga, this showstopper will provide both tranquility and space for hosting friends.

episodes.name: Rosario Dawson's House Glow Up
episodes.overview: Rosario Dawson is showing her immense gratitude to the person she has known since she was 19. Plans to update his unique home have gone by the wayside so she wants to take over, leaning on Jonathan and Drew's superpowers to create the ultimate surprise.

episodes.name: Zoe Saldana's Electrifying Surprise
episodes.overview: Zoe Saldana is giving back to her best friend and makeup artist of 15 years. Zoe is forgoing the special effects and enlisting Jonathan and Drew to embark in a jaw-dropping house transformation that will leave everyone speechless!

episodes.name: Sterling K. Brown's Family Affair
episodes.overview: Sterling K. Brown is giving back to the woman he considers family and who has cared for HIS family for the last six years. She has purchased her first home, and Sterling wants Jonathan and Drew's help to surprise her with the home of her dreams.

episodes.name: Patricia Arquette's Life-Changing Reno
episodes.overview: Patricia Arquette gives back to a longtime family friend who was close with Patricia's mother and has since become an indelible figure in her children's lives. Patricia is leaning on Jonathan and Drew to help deliver a life-changing renovation.

episodes.name: Marlee Matlin Crushes the Backyard
episodes.overview: Marlee Matlin is surprising her BFF of over 25 years with the ultimate, custom-made backyard. Marlee joins forces with Jonathan and Drew to create a deaf-friendly space with top-of-the-line finishes, outdoor kitchen, and a massive spa to relax in.

episodes.name: Lawrence Fishburne's Foolproof Surprise
episodes.overview: Laurence Fishburne is giving back to his right hand man and someone he's considered a brother for the past 15 years. Laurence challenges Jonathan and Drew to craft a resort-level backyard retreat where his friend can relax and entertain all year long.

episodes.name: Camryn and Milo Manheim's Surprise for Mama Mia
episodes.overview: Camryn and Milo Manheim are surprising their longtime family friend and the woman Milo says is like a second mom. The mother-son duo is teaming up with Jonathan and Drew to gift "Mama Mia" a complete and stylish culinary makeover in her beloved kitchen.

7.name: Season 7
7.overview: This season may be the best one yet, as redesigns get more detailed and timelines are even tighter than usual. But each remodel gets every ounce of hard work and creativity necessary to make the space magical. Every reveal is an emotional roller coaster as the celebrities jump right in because of their gratitude for amazing people.

episodes.name: Mandy Moore's Backyard to Remember
episodes.overview: Mandy Moore is returning the love to "Ce-Ce," a woman who has been deeply ingrained in her life for the past 15 years. Mandy is calling on Jonathan and Drew to create the ultimate outdoor oasis for family get-togethers and backyard BBQs.

episodes.name: Wanda Sykes Razes The Roof
episodes.overview: Wanda Sykes gives thanks to her honorary niece, Amber, whose family has been an integral part of Wanda's life. Now, Wanda's partnering up with Jonathan and Drew for a bedroom and bathroom refresh in a house that's been in Amber's family for generations.

episodes.name: Danny Trejo's Backyard Domination
episodes.overview: Danny Trejo pulls out all the stops to surprise his ex-partner turned best friend, and her family. "Machete" with the help of Jonathan and Drew transform a wasted space backyard garage into the perfect, multifunctional getaway.

episodes.name: Tony Hawk Flips for Friend
episodes.overview: The king of skateboarding, Tony Hawk, teams up with Jonathan and Drew to carve out the ultimate hangout and work space for his friend of 10 years. With subtle odes to their love of skateboarding, the team aims to maximize the potential of a small garage.

episodes.name: Jennifer Jason Leigh's Surprise
episodes.overview: Jennifer Jason Leigh calls on Jonathan and Drew to sneak a home makeover for a longtime family friend. She's as selfless as they come and finds it hard to receive gifts, so Jennifer takes the reins to surprise her with a chic refresh to her living spaces.

episodes.name: Mira Sorvino's Mighty Makeover
episodes.overview: Mira Sorvino enlists Jonathan and Drew to help breathe new life into the home of someone she considers a sister. Plumbing problems have forced the family to move out, so Mira steps in to repair and transform this generational home.

episodes.name: Zack Braff Masters a Custom Remodel
episodes.overview: Zach Braff scrubs in for a special operation: a renovation for his best friend and new homeowner drowning in to-dos. With the help of Jonathan and Drew, they work out the kinks to craft a forever dream home for this family of four.
